metadata.title: CVE-2023-0597 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw possibility of memory leak in the Linux kernel cpu_entry_areamapping of X86 CPU data to memory was found in the way user can guesslocation of exception stack(s) or other important data. A local user coulduse this flaw to get access to some important data with expected locationin memory.
